notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: The conceptualization of this journal article is from U.R. The experimental work and methodology were designed by J.A.; the writing—original draft was prepared by J.A. and U.R. helped with the editing and supervision and reviewing of the manuscript. T.Y.C.S. provided the scientific guidance for the successful completion of the project and helped to review the final draft of the manuscript. M.L.I. helped to investigate the catalysts and M.A.H. helped to review the final draft of the paper and also assisted in the biodiesel analysis. J.N. helped to rearrange the content of the paper and also improving its language.
